means: 计划，打算，设计( plan的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Estonia said it too planned to hold a referendum on independence.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱沙尼亚称其也计划就独立问题进行全民公决。

sentence.Network_en: The event will go ahead as planned in Sheffield next summer.
sentence.Network_cn: 这项活动将按计划于明年夏天在谢菲尔德举行。

sentence.Network_en: A planned demonstration has been called off by its organisers.
sentence.Network_cn: 原定的游行示威已被组织者取消。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Cooper and Conrad could not do any of the planned experiments ., 库珀和康拉德不能按计划做任何试验.
《Friends》词汇表A ... projectile n. 射弹 planned adj. 计划了的, 根据计划的 involve vt. 包括, 笼罩, 潜心于, 使陷于.
planned in advance , thought out ., 预先计划好的 , 有预谋的.
he planned to have gone abroad ., 他原计划出国.

list.abs: 城市_互动百科 ... 城镇体系规划（ urban system pLANning） 城市规划（ urban planning） 城市设计（ urban design）.
HONEY'S WEDDING PLANNER 哈妮姿创意婚礼工坊 ... 公司地图 Map 婚礼策划 Wedding Planning 婚礼手绘 Wedding Sketch.
项目管理术语英汉对照表 - MBA智库百科 ... Gain Sharing Arrangements 收获分享协议 Game Plan 通盘计划 Gantt 甘特.
舞台英文术语 ... Building 剧场建设 seating plan 座位表 Architectural Drawings 建筑图表.

entry.def: A plan is a method of achieving something that you have worked out in detail beforehand.

example.ex: The three leaders had worked out a peace plan...
example.tran: 3位领导人已制订出了一个和平方案。

example.ex: The project is part of a United Nations plan for refugees.
example.tran: 该项目是联合国难民计划的一部分。

entry.def: If you plan what you are going to do, you decide in detail what you are going to do, and you intend to do it.

example.ex: If you plan what you're going to eat, you reduce your chances of overeating...
example.tran: 如果计划一下要吃什么，就有可能不会吃得过多。

example.ex: He planned to leave Baghdad on Monday...
example.tran: 他计划周一离开巴格达。

entry.tran: （有做某一特定事的）计划，打算，意向
entry.def: If you have plans, you are intending to do a particular thing.

example.ex: 'I'm sorry,' she said. 'I have plans for tonight.'
The government is making plans to evacuate more than two hundred of its citizens from the troubled area.
example.tran: 政府打算疏散200多名留在骚乱地区的公民。

entry.tran: 设计；绘制…的图样（或图表）
entry.def: When you plan something that you are going to make, build, or create, you decide what the main parts of it will be and do a drawing of how it should be made.

example.ex: We are planning a new kitchen.

entry.def: A plan of something that is going to be built or made is a detailed diagram or drawing of it.

example.ex: ...when you have drawn a plan of the garden.
example.tran: 当你画出花园的平面图后

means.word_mean: 1. designed or carried out according to a plan;

auth_sentence.content: Follow-ups were planned, largely recorded and then abandoned.
auth_sentence.res_content: Follow-ups were planned, largely recorded and then abandoned.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Follow-ups were planned, largely recorded and then abandoned.

auth_sentence.content: It happened as we hoped, planned and wanted.
auth_sentence.res_content: It happened as we hoped, planned and wanted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It happened as we hoped, planned and wanted.

auth_sentence.content: Wonder what they've got planned for this afternoon?
auth_sentence.res_content: Wonder what they've got planned for this afternoon?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Wonder what they've got planned for this afternoon?

Sentence.sentence: The thefts are not the carefully planned burglaries(入室盗窃)that you see in movies.
Realizing that this particular audience would find his regional accent unattractive, Larry planned to speak with an accent that would be more acceptable to his audience.
He had also planned the content of his speech to focus on the teams with the best records, the ones that had won the most games in the last season
